Description: Independent Design Verification Reports - IDV services across all disciplines and submission stages (30/60/90/IFC)
Notes: Allowance for IDV services without vendor quotes; assumes 8 disciplines x 4 stages at $10-12k per review

Description: VFPA IP Review Responses - technical response preparation and documentation
Notes: Allowance for IP review technical responses; assumes 4-6 major submission cycles at $15-20k each

Description: VFPA IP Review Coordination - authority coordination scheduling meetings
Notes: Allowance for IP coordination effort; interface with VFPA reviewers and schedule management

Description: Design Coordination - inter-discipline coordination activities and meetings
Notes: Allowance for coordination effort; assumes 18-24 months active design at ~$4k/month

Description: Clash Detection & Resolution - BIM coordination and clash reports
Notes: Allowance for clash detection services; model coordination and resolution tracking

Description: RFI Management - RFI log maintenance response coordination tracking
Notes: Allowance for RFI management; assumes 200-400 RFIs over design duration at ~$75-125 each for tracking/coordination

Description: QA/QC Engineering Review Allocation - quality oversight of design verification process
Notes: 18% of notional engineering review allocation ($306k); QA/QC oversight of IDV and coordination processes
6% of Engineering base ($445k); project management overhead allocation
2% of third-party engineering services ($445k); procurement coordination for IDV contracts

Description: IDV Report Documentation and Records - final compilation and archival
Notes: Included in L001 IDV services allowance; no separate line item required
